hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select rownum as EOOI_MAX_ROW, EOTI.EOTI_ID as EOOI_ID, EOTI.CREATOR as CREATOR, EOTI.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME, EOTI.MODIFIER as MODIFIER, EOTI.MODIFY_TIME as MODIFY_TIME, EOTI.REC_VER as REC_VER, EOTI.REC_STATUS as REC_STATUS, EOTI.ORG_ID as ORG_ID, EOTI.PM_CODE as PM_CODE, EOTI.EOTI_CODE as EOOI_CODE, EOTI.EOTI_NAME as EOOI_NAME, EOTI.EOTI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE as EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOTI.EOTI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME as EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOTI.EOTI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE as EOOI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOTI.EOTI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME as EOOI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOTI.EOTI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE as EOOI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOTI.EOTI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME as EOOI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOTI.EOTI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY as EOOI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOTI.EOTI_QUANTITY as EOOI_QUANTITY, EOTI.EOTI_GROSS_WEIGHT as EOOI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOTI.EOTI_NET_WEIGHT as EOOI_NET_WEIGHT, EOTI.EOTI_VOLUME as EOOI_VOLUME, EOTI.EOTI_LOT_NO as EOOI_LOT_NO, EOTI.EOTI_PRICE as EOOI_PRICE, EOTI.EOTI_AMOUNT as EOOI_AMOUNT, EOTI.EOTI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE as EOOI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOTI.EOTI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME as EOOI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOTI.EOTI_TEMPERATURE_FM as EOOI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOTI.EOTI_TEMPERATURE_TO as EOOI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOTI.EOTI_REMARK as EOOI_REMARK from EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_ITEM EOTI where 1=1 << AND EOTI.EOTI_EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> << AND EOTI.ORG_ID LIKE :orgId >>
